rooms.description: Minimalist kitchen designed for efficient workflow, located adjacent to the living room.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with essential fixtures and proper drainage system.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for additional storage or laundry facilities.

Adjacent to living room for access to upper floor

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A minimalist bedroom designed with ample storage and natural light. Vastu compliant layout with the bed positioned in the southwest corner.

rooms.name: Home Office/Study
